targets.query: SELECT distinct("session_key") FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'Session') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "title", "friendly_name", "quality", "video_decision", "quality_profile", "platform", "product_version", "location", "username"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES ON varken WITH KEY = "section_name"
